USA (MO, NY, CA)

Server Main Features

******************

- cPanel Control Panel

- Latest Intel Xeon/AMD Processors

- Super NVMe SSD Hard Drive (20 times faster than normal SSD)

- 1 Gbps Redundant Network Uplinks

- Anti-DDoS Protection

- 99.9% Server uptime

Software Features

****************

- CloudLinux OS+

- ConfigServer eXploit Scanner 9 (CXS)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*************

- Inbound & Outbound Email Filtering by SpamExperts/MailChannels

- Outgoing Spam Monitor (OSM)

- MailScanner Front-End - Mail Scanner

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*******************************

• SPEED=100%

• PMEM=2GB

• VMEM=2GB

• I/O=8MB/s

• IOPS=2,024

• NPROC=100

• EP=30

• Inodes: Unlimited
